landing.bio: I am a full stack developer with 2 years of experience in bulding scalable, modern web applications.

experience.aboutWork: Developed an automation framework which is used for testing of Symantec Encryption Products.
Developed customer experience/stories section for gsered.com with WYSIWYG editor.

projects.title: Blogging Website
projects.description: Developed a modern web-application for blogging with OAuth 2.0 for authentication.

projects.title: Reconstructing Obfuscated Human faces using Conditional GAN
projects.description: Implemented Condition GAN to reconstruct distorted human face images.

projects.title: Operating System Simulation Using C++
projects.description: Simulated operating system environment using C++ file handling.

projects.title: Student Schedular (Android Application)
projects.description: A custom application for student timetable management.

interests.paragraphOne: Apart from being a web developer, I enjoy competitive programming and blogging.
